Majority?

Excluding the Tyrx Chronicles [which everybody or almost everybody 
agrees suck], the only other complete set out right now (that I know 
of) is the tevfifty.  If there are any other complete sets [that are 
not being worked on] out there, tell me where they are.

I am not sure that even a beginning team could take on all the 
scenarios in the tevfifty [my own legitimate team had trouble with a 
couple of scenarios and it had been through all known existing 
scenarios] and I know for a fact that no beginning team would have 
snowball's chance in the rain forest of beating the Tryx Chonicles.

My own levels are for the opposite purpose you have described.  They 
are designed to build up a team to a certain point [a point in which 
no one should attempt to go beyond], but using a beginning team in my 
1st scenario would be result in a guaranteed loss.

In some of my scenarios, extra temporary characters would prove very 
helpfull.

To me, the point is to play with the same team as long as possible and 
see how well you can do compared to others.  Right now, the least 
experience level of my 100% legitimate team is 33 (the mage has it) 
and I am working on trying to bring him upto experience level 50 [the 
rest of my team has long past that point].
